title: FS: T206 Cy Young Bare Hand Shows-SGC 1
author: slaudio

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young Bare Hand Shows-SGC 1
posts.post_content:
If your name is Richard Montague, this card has your name on it!

$1500 net to me.  I'm new on the forum so we will have to figure out a payment that works for both of us.

Thanks

Nice card.
I’m surprised at the grade, looks much nicer than a 1.
SGC used to lump all such (F-Ex+) marked cards as 20/1.5.
This looks like a new holder.  I wonder if SGC has a new policy/standard for marked cards.
